**Ventilation, Heating and Air Conditioning System Replacement**
=====================

**Contract Procurement Information**

*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-04-29T14:00:00
*   Amendment Date: 2024-04-29
*   Solicitation Number: 21C30-24-4551253B
*   Contracting Entity: Correctional Service of Canada
*   Contact Information:
    *   Linda Mandeville, [linda.mandeville@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:linda.mandeville@csc-scc.gc.ca), (438) 357-6503

**Trade Agreements and Procurement Strategy**

This tender is open to all interested suppliers and is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The procurement strategy is competitive, with the lowest priced compliant bid being the selection criteria.

**Procurement Overview**

The Correctional Service of Canada, CORCAN, requires the services of a contractor to replace the ventilation system (HVAC) located in Building 18 at the Cowansville Institution. The contractor must provide the tools, equipment, supplies, labor, and transportation necessary to complete the work.

**Mandatory Site Visit**

A mandatory site visit will take place on April 17, 2024, at 10:30 a.m. (EDT). The visit details are included in the solicitation document.

**Objective and Deliverables**

The objective is to replace the heating, ventilation, and air conditioning system. The contractor must deliver the following:

*   Replacement of the ventilation system (HVAC) located in Building 18
*   Provision of tools, equipment, supplies, labor, and transportation necessary to complete the work
*   Compliance with the solicitation document and associated documents

**Timeline**

*   Construction Time: 27 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer
*   File Number: 21C30-24-4551253B

**Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC)**

PAC offers seminars to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada. The seminars are free and cover topics such as understanding the federal procurement process, searching for opportunities, and preparing to sell to the government.

Note to Bidders: For the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria, download the solicitation document and associated documents from [Achats Canada / occasions de marché](https://www.canada.ca/fr/achats-canada/renseign
